text: Guft (Jusuf): «Ba sumo hec nav' taome, ki dar xoʙ doda mesaved, naxohad omad, magar xaʙardor kunam sumoro ʙa ta'ʙiri on, pes az on ki daleli sidqi in ta'ʙir dar ʙedori ʙa sumo ʙijojad, cunon ki Parvardigoram ʙa man omuzonidaast. Hamono, man dini mardumero, ki ʙa Allohi jakto imon nadorand va ʙa ruzi qijomat kofirand, tark kardaam
